author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty-Seven! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

The HUNTERS are here. In the tradition of Monster Hunting games and stories like Hametsu, The Witcher, Monster Hunter or Rangers of Shadowdeep, Cazadores lets you equip roughly 1-4 miniatures aside and take teams of up to four on adventures. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebooks in digital  HERE: https://matachingames.itch.io/cazadores
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 047 - CAZADORES  by Matachin Games
